name: Minute Escape (AidanAndrews)
description:
MinuteEscape is a semi physics based platformer bullet hell where you have to climb out and escape from a prison in the ground. You have a massive ball and chain with which to swing around to block incoming bullets and smash the crystals shooting at you. My Submission for the 2022 Bullet Hell Jam

Music is "NES Boss" by Twin Musicom (twinmusicom.org)
